alert.note: Alert for Orofino, Grangeville Region; Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 8:01AM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Idaho County through 730 AM PDT... At 700 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lowell, or 19 miles east of Kamiah, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half-inch size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lowell and Syringa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Orofino, Grangeville Region; Southern Clearwater Mountains
